H0.text: New Zealander Jack Lovelock gained fame in the1930's in which field. Rugby

H1.text: New Zealander Jack Lovelock gained fame in the1930's in which field. Cricket

H3.text: New Zealander Jack Lovelock gained fame in the1930's in which field. Athletics

A4.text: John Edward Lovelock (5 January 1910 â€“ 28 December 1949) was a New Zealand athlete who became the world 1500m and mile record holder and 1936 Olympic champion in the 1500 metres.

A5.text: He won the gold medal in the 1500 m at the Berlin Olympics, setting a world record in the final (3:47.8).
